title: Microsoft Edge is better than Google Chrome, but I can't bring myself to switch
description: A Windows update makes Chrome's simple switching tool more annoying than Microsoft Edge. Imagine that!

title: Google Messages could be the next app to get added AI
description: A new feature called Magic Compose is heading to Google Messages to give users some AI assistance.

title: The Pixel Watch 2 is rumored to be launching alongside the Pixel 8
description: According to inside sources, we'll get a Pixel Watch 2 and a more basic Fitbit watch for kids in October.

title: This might be the most secure browser in the world - but also the least
description: The Indian tech giant is probably trying to educate about browser privacy - but will it make a difference?

title: Microsoft could be planning to let widgets loose on the Windows 11 desktop
description: Here’s another piece of Microsoft’s Windows 11 widget masterplan, which appears to be rapidly falling into place.

title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Saturday, May 6 (game #467)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

title: This $12 gadget can convert your old SSD into a portable SSD in 10 seconds
description: A USB to SATA converter is all you need to give a new lease of life to your old solid state drive
